remarks: Lower dimension axiom for one dimension.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 28-May-2019.)
statement:
tglowdim1.p $e |- P = ( Base ` G ) $.
tglowdim1.d $e |- .- = ( dist ` G ) $.
tglowdim1.i $e |- I = ( Itv ` G ) $.
tglowdim1.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. TarskiG ) $.
tglowdim1.1 $e |- ( ph -> 2 <_ ( # ` P ) ) $.
tglowdim1i.1 $e |- ( ph -> X e. P ) $.
tglowdim1i $p |- ( ph -> E. y e. P X =/= y ) $.
$d P y $.
$d X y $.
